main.name: Alejandro De Jesus
main.description: As a mobile developer, I have gained a lot of experience through several projects. I have accomplished a wide range of frontend and backend programming languages and frameworks.
main.bio: I specialize in React Native, iOS, JavaScript, Swift, Xcode, firebase, Fastlane, unit testing, solidity, TDD, redux, Fastlane, jest, and API Gateway. I’ve been working on modern Javascript frameworks and libraries like Redux, React Native. I implement industry best practices for search engine, optimization, performance, accessibility, and testing. I always like to write clean code that will be easy for future developers to work on. I am constantly learning and evolving as a programmer. The technologies that I am learning are solidity, smart contracts, and typescript, I enjoy working and learning with teammates.

testimonials.text: Ale en el entorno laboral es muy dedicada y siempre en busca de mejorar lo que se le presenta. Tuve la suerte de poder trabajar con él y ante cualquier tema que se le dio lo resolvió de muy buena forma. Con el paso del tiempo me di cuenta que le apasiona el trabajo de sistemas y siempre está en búsqueda de aprender nuevos temas. Doy fe de que lo que se le presente en el futuro lo resolverá con profesionalismo.
testimonials.user: Leonardo Donato - Integration Middleware & API Team Leader
